Package affix.java.effective.moneyservice

Class Statistic

  • java.lang.Object
    • affix.java.effective.moneyservice.Statistic
  • public class Statistic
extends java.lang.Object
    Statistic generator for producing data like total amount, quantity, average amount and profit
    Author:
    Group Center

    • Constructor Detail

      • Statistic

        public Statistic​(java.util.List<Transaction> transactions,
                 java.util.List<java.lang.String> currencyCodes,
                 java.lang.String siteName)
        Parameters:
        transactions - - a list of transactions
        currencyCodes - - a list of currency codes
        siteName - - a String holding the site name, like "NORTH", "CENTER", "SOUTH" etc..
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if * No transactions provided * Missing currency codes * Missing site name

      • getProfit

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> getProfit​(java.lang.String filteredDate)
        Method for calculating the profit in the reference currency for each currency per day Reading the exchange rates from file based on date.
        Parameters:
        filteredDate - - a string holding a date in the format of YYYY-MM-DD
        Returns:
        Map holding the result of calculation with profit in each currency per day in List<Transaction>

      • getAverageAmountBuy

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> getAverageAmountBuy()

        Returns:
        a resulting map holding the calculated average for each currency for BUY-transactions

      • initializeFromSites

        public static java.util.List<Statistic> initializeFromSites​(java.util.Set<Site> sites,
                                                            java.time.LocalDate startDay,
                                                            java.time.LocalDate endDay,
                                                            java.util.List<java.lang.String> currencies)
        Initialize statistics for each site, and fetch transactions.
        Parameters:
        sites - - Site which to initialize new statistics from.
        startDay - - The start day.
        endDay - - The end day.
        currencies - - Decides which transactions for currencies to use.
        Returns:
        the statistics for each site.
